title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.86 - Salinity control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 890.86 - Salinity control

State Regulations

The drought of record, which occurred in the period
1961-1967, shall be the basis for planning and development of facilities and
programs for control of salinity in the Delaware estuary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
890.86

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
